title: [Large-Scale] Synchronous Video-Supported Clinical Skills Training: Short-Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Knowledge and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: An Online Course for Healthcare Professionals Aimed at Enhancing Clinical Skills Competency. Conducted in a Bring-Your-Own-Device (BYOD) Environment

learning_goals: Learners can perform ≥3 core clinical skills with ≥80% accuracy using synchronized videos.
After video-based practice, learners can analyze skill performance processes with ≥70% accuracy and derive improvement points through self-assessment.
Learners can conduct peer feedback sessions using online collaboration tools and provide ≥3 instances of constructive feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
